summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Monday, July 29, 2019. It details staff posts, shifts, and status changes (e.g., sick leave, annual leave) for correctional officers and administrative personnel. The document was created and finalized on the morning of July 29, 2019.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as an officer assigned to SHU 01 and later marked for Sick/Annual leave on July 27, 2019.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift scheduling for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a routine prison staff assignment log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 29, 2019.
The document shows standard prison operations with posts like SHU (Special Housing Unit), WITSEC (Witness Security), and various control and escort officer assignments.
It records staff status changes including sick leave, annual leave, and time-off awards, indicating normal administrative procedures.
The document itself was finalized on January 25, 2019, at 7:18 AM, suggesting it is a record printed or saved from the prison's scheduling system.
